strong.style: font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 24px;

span.style: font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 18px;

p.span: 鼠标的手感

span.style: color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;

p.span: 手长

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: 中指指尖到手掌根部掌纹的距离

span.style: font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-size: 14px;

p.span: 手长大于18.5cm最好选择120-127mm的鼠标

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: 手长小于18.5cm最好选择115-120mm的鼠标

span.style: color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;

p.span: 握鼠标姿势

span.style: font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-size: 14px;

p.span: 捏握：手指头捏着鼠标，手掌不接触鼠标

span.style: color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 14px;

p.span: 建议选择左右对称鼠标

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";

p.span: 抓握：手指和手掌部分接触鼠标

span.style: color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 14px;

p.span: 建议选择左右对称鼠标

span.style: font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-size: 14px;

p.span: 趴握：手指和手掌完全接触

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: 建议选择右手工程学鼠标

span.style: color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;

p.span: 鼠标材质

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";

p.span: 镜面

span.style: font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-size: 14px;

p.span: 外观好，手感一般，容易清洁，容易沾染手汗

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";

p.span: 类肤

span.style: font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-size: 14px;

p.span: 外观一般，手感极好，容易磨损，容易沾染手汗和指纹

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: 塑料磨砂

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: 外观一般，手感一般，防手汗，干爽

span.style: color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;

p.span: 鼠标重量

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: 120g以上属于“习武之人”

span.style: color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 14px;

p.span: 110g属于长时间使用的上限

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: 80-100g是鼠标最佳重量

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: 鼠标前后的重量要均匀，不要出现重心靠前靠后的情况

span.style: font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 18px;

p.span: 鼠标的硬件

span.style: font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-size: 14px;

p.span: DPI

span.style: color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 14px;

p.span: 定义：鼠标每移动一英寸（2.54厘米），屏幕上移动多少个像素点

span.style: color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 14px;

p.span: 常用的DPI是400-3000，太高人类也不需要

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: IPS

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: 鼠标每秒移动这个数值英寸，会出现掉帧现象

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: 一般60IPS就够用了

span.style: font-size: 14px; color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";

p.span: 回报率

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: 鼠标每秒与电脑沟通的次数

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: 会加重CPU负担，一般电竞也就需要 500Hz（2ms响应）

span.style: color: rgb(30, 53, 86); font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 14px;

p.span: 板载内存

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; color: rgb(30, 53, 86);

p.span: 记录鼠标的自定义配置，换个地方不用重新设置
